title: Moff, Makers of the Wearable Smart Toy, Introduces Android Version of the Moff App
text:
Moff Band Now Compatible with Both Google Android and Apple iOS Smartphones and Tablets; Moff App Available on Google Play Store as a Free Download
San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Moff announces today that its Android app is now available in the Google Play Store, making the Moff Band wearable toy compatible with the millions of Android smartphones and tablets worldwide. The new Moff Android app is a free download and connects via Bluetooth to the Moff Band, the world’s first wearable smart slap bracelet for kids ages 3-9. By choosing sounds and play activities on the Moff app, kids wearing the Moff Band can move around and be active with realistic sounds that follow their arm movements. For example, as kids swing their arms, a whisk can become a tennis racket, a spoon doubles as a magic wand and pencils turn into drumsticks — the Moff Band encourages kids to exercise their imagination!
“The Moff Band is the only children’s wearable that combines accelerometer, gyroscope and Bluetooth sensors with an app and gaming development platform,” says Aki Takahagi, co-founder and CEO, Moff Inc. “Today’s availability of the Android version of the Moff app ensures that kids and parents with smartphones or tablets — regardless of whether it is an Android or iOS device — can now enjoy hours of imaginative and active fun with the Moff Band wearable smart toy.”
The Moff Android app requires Android version 4.4 and greater and supports best-selling Android devices including Samsung Galaxy S4, S5, S6, Note Edge; Motorola Moto G; Google Nexus 4, 5, 6, 9; Sony Xperia Z, Z1, Z3, Z4. For an updated list of supported devices, please visit support.moff.mobi.
About the Moff Band:, the Wearable Smart Toy
Moff Band app includes 30 sound effects: Air Drums, Air Guitar, Sword, Ninja, Magic Wand, Tennis, Golf, Cooking, Percussion and more New sounds and play activities made available weekly as free app updates Suggested ages: 3-9 years old Multiplayer: Two Moff Bands can sync to a single Android (or iOS) device; 40+ foot Bluetooth range between smart device and Moff Band Available on Amazon and The Grommet for suggested retail price of US$54.99 Compatible with smartphones and tablets running Android 4.4 and greater; Apple iOS 7.1 and greater
